org.vertx.java.core.http

Interface WebSocketHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Handler<WebSocket>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WebSocketMatcher

    public interface WebSocketHandler
extends Handler<WebSocket>
    Handler for websockets.
    Author:
    Tim Fox

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accept(java.lang.String path)
      Before sending back a response for a WebSocket handshake the server will first call the accept(java.lang.String) method to see if the WebSocket should be accepted at that path.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.vertx.java.core.Handler

        handle

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        boolean accept(java.lang.String path)
        Before sending back a response for a WebSocket handshake the server will first call the accept(java.lang.String) method to see if the WebSocket should be accepted at that path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the WebSocket upgrade request
        Returns:
        true to accept the WebSocket, or false to reject it. Rejected upgrade requests will have a 404 served to them
